title: Levitical Cities Assigned
summary: Joshua 21 describes how the Levites, who had no tribal land, were given 48 cities scattered throughout the tribes of Israel. The chapter concludes with a powerful reminder that God fulfilled every promise He made to Israel.

faq.question: How many cities were given to the Levites?
faq.answer: Forty-eight cities, including pasturelands, were distributed among the tribes.

faq.question: What important truth is emphasized at the end of the chapter?
faq.answer: That not one of God’s promises to Israel had failed—every one was fulfilled.
